channel.description: Recent content in projects on Mason Zhang

item.title: Portal Mirrors
item.description: Inspiration Planning to make some Portal mirrors to decorate my room once I settle down in California. Inspired by this video.

item.title: Website
item.description: Inspiration I’ve been meaning to make a website for a while. In college, the thought process was to create a digital portfolio to showcase my worth. Now that I’ve graduated and have some time to kill before starting work, it’s mostly just a fun project for self-improvement purposes. I figured that I could document all of my hobby projects and share some of my thoughts online rather than letting everything sit on my hard drive, for my eyes only.
